TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35 extends System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension

summary.span: 針對 XML 結構描述項目宣告，產生 .NET Framework 類型的內部對應。

span.span: Generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations.

summary.span: 根據 展開，為針對 .NET Framework 3.5 版所建立的具類型資料集提供額外的功能。

span.span: Expands upon to provide additional functionality for typed datasets created for .NET Framework version 3.5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35` 呼叫受保護的建構函式的適用於.NET Framework 3.5 版產生具類型資料集，並啟用 LINQ to DataSet 和階層式更新。`System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtensionFx35` calls the protected constructor of to generate typed datasets for the .NET Framework version 3.5 and enable LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update. > [!NOTE] > LINQ to DataSet 和階層式更新會在 新增功能[!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]。LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update are features that were added in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]. > > 另請參閱[階層式更新概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6)並[LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md)。Also see [Hierarchical Update Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6) and [LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進一步延伸了提供型別資料集的其他功能，適用於.NET Framework 3.5 版。Expands upon to provide additional functionality for typed datasets for .NET Framework version 3.5. 呼叫受保護的建構函式的適用於.NET Framework 3.5 版產生具類型資料集，並啟用 LINQ to DataSet 和階層式更新。 calls the protected constructor of to generate typed datasets for .NET Framework version 3.5 and enable LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update. > [!NOTE] > LINQ to Dataset 和階層式更新會在功能[!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]。LINQ to Dataset and hierarchical update are features in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]. 請參閱[LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md)並[階層式更新概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6)。See [LINQ to DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/linq-to-dataset.md) and [Hierarchical Update Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6).
